comment.author: 87938933@N00
comment._content: These are amazing photos I am so happy they are on flickr now!  The only older photos I have seen of the Lincoln Park Zoo are from postcards and they just are not as "real" as these are.  Thanks!

comment.author: 35310696@N04
comment._content: I'm glad you like them. These are the highlights; I'll be adding the rest of our Lincoln Park Zoo collection in the coming weeks.

comment.author: 8648347@N05
comment._content: These photographs are of course historical, but also extremely emotional. Look at the faceless people glaring at this caged polar bear. It's surreal really. Beautiful but sad.
